Title: Lake Hollywood
Writer: David Hollander, Mike Binder, Ann Biderman (created by), Miki Johnson (story editor), David Sonnenborn (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Hector's wife confronts him and he deals with Marisol. Mickey, Bunchy and Teresa go to Ray's house. Ray does everything he can to ensure his family's safety and save his friend.
